Ngoc Hoi.title: Ngoc Hoi
Ngoc Hoi.byline: Ngoc Hoi is a small town located near border of Laos on Ho Chi Minh Trail.

Ngorongoro Conservation Area.title: Ngorongoro Conservation Area
Ngorongoro Conservation Area.byline: Ngorongoro Conservation Area is a park and UNESCO World Heritage site in Northeast Tanzania.
